DASHBOARD.TITLE: Welcome in
DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION: An insightfull dashboard application for livestock management in close and long range giving information to monitor growth, income and expenditure
ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity logs
ACTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Recent activities done in your organization
FINANCE.TITLE: Your Finances
FINANCE.DESCRIPTION: Introducing our dynamic finance section to monitor income and expenses for seamless management and insightful analysis.
ALERT.TITLE: Are you absolutely sure?
ALERT.DESCRIPTION: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently remove your data from your farm.
CONTACT.TITLE: Contact us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Write or call us any time you have isseus using aur app, to help us improve your experience by adding new fonctionalities or just to greet we appreciate thanks
CONTACT.SUBJECT: Subjet
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Send us a message
ANIMALTYPE.TITLE: Choose a farm
ANIMALTYPE.DESCRIPTION: Create your boxes, raise your animals, breed, follow up on gestation, inventory your births & deaths and make analysis to monitor growth and efficiency
ANIMALTYPE.BROILERS.DESCRIPTION: Create your chicken coops, raise your poultry, fatten them, take inventory of your dead and make analysis to monitor growth and efficiency in your farm.
ANIMALTYPE.EGGHAVESTING.DESCRIPTION: Harvest eggs everyday and calibrate them according to thier size
ANIMALTYPE.LAYERS.DESCRIPTION: Create your chicken coops, raise your poultry, fatten them, collect eggs, incubate, take inventory of your dead and make analysis to monitor growth and efficiency in your farm.
ANIMALTYPE.LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: Create, view and edit your animal locations according to thier production phase to monitor thier well being and pin point thier exact location anytime
ANIMALTYPE.ANIMALS.DESCRIPTION: Add an animal in your organization by creating his profile with all necessary informations and edit it when ever you like
ANIMALTYPE.GESTATION.DESCRIPTION: Monitor the state of your females in gestation period for any problems prior to farrowing
ANIMALTYPE.BREEDING.DESCRIPTION: Monitor your animals breeding schedule preventing inbreeding by avoiding breeding animals with very close relations
ANIMALTYPE.WEANING.DESCRIPTION: Wean your animals and select the females with high parenting ability to increase reproduction rate.
ANIMALTYPE.ISOLATION.DESCRIPTION: Isolate your animals in the event of illness, infection or newly arrived to avoid contamination and the spread of disease in your farm.
SALE.TITLE: Recent Sales
SALE.DESCRIPTION: Introducing Our Dynamic Sale Section for Seamless Management, monitor income, proficiency and make insightful analysis.
